summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ForaTask multi-tenant SaaS application including backend APIs, Admin Panel UI, and Marketing Website. All critical functionality tested successfully with minor frontend validation issues identified.

design_issues.issue: Email validation prevents form submission even with valid email format

passed_tests: Backend API: Company registration with 90-day free trial subscription (100% success)
Backend API: User login with subscription status in response
Backend API: Price calculator for different user counts (1, 3, 5, 7, 10, 15 users)
Backend API: Master admin authentication with correct credentials
Backend API: Master admin dashboard statistics (companies, users, subscriptions, MRR)
Backend API: Master admin companies list with pagination and search
Backend API: Master admin company details with subscription info
Backend API: Trial extension functionality (30 days)
Backend API: Company restriction and unrestriction by master admin
Backend API: Subscription status retrieval with all required fields
Backend API: Task completion history endpoint authentication and structure
Backend API: Payment creation returns 503 as expected (Razorpay not configured)
Admin Panel UI: Login flow with master admin credentials
Admin Panel UI: Dashboard with statistics (11 companies, 11 users, ₹0 MRR)
Admin Panel UI: Companies list with 11 companies displayed
Admin Panel UI: Company details page with subscription info, task stats, payment history
Admin Panel UI: Navigation between dashboard, companies, and detail pages
Admin Panel UI: Action buttons (Extend Trial, Restrict) on company details
Marketing Website: Homepage with hero section, navigation, CTA buttons
Marketing Website: Pricing page with interactive calculator (₹249 base plan)
Marketing Website: Signup page with step indicators (1, 2, 3)
Marketing Website: Form validation and user experience
Marketing Website: Navigation between pages (homepage, pricing, signup)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix email validation in marketing website signup form - currently preventing form submission with valid email addresses
